content.text: The vehicle connector and plug of configurations type  2 shall be provided with coding resistors (Rc) to define  the maximum current capability of the cable assembly  and vehicle connector and plug.
The resistor values and tolerances shall be as specified  in B-2 of IS 17017 (Part 1):2018 - "Circuit for  simultaneous proximity detection and current coding".

requirements.text: The vehicle connector and plug of configurations type  2 shall be provided with coding resistors (Rc) to define  the maximum current capability of the cable assembly  and vehicle connector and plug.
